#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int reverse_num(int a)
{
	int b = 0;
	int factor = 1;
	int rem;

	do
	{
		rem = a % 10;
		a = a / 10;
		b = b * 10 + rem;
	} while (a != 0);
	return b;
}

bool isPalin(int a)
{
	return a == reverse_num(a);
}

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);

	int N, num, itr,i;
	cin >> N;
	for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		cin >> num;
		itr = 0;
		while (!isPalin(num))
		{
			itr++;
			num = num + reverse_num(num);
		}

		cout << itr << " " << num << endl;
	}
}
